item.title: Jennifer Garner’s family 'wants' her back with ex Ben Affleck especially after… - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Jennifer Garner's Family Hopes for Reunion with Ex-Husband Ben Affleck

Published on: Jan 02, 2025 06:57 AM IST

Jennifer Garner's family is rooting for a reunion between the actress and her ex-husband Ben Affleck, as the former couple has been spending quality time together with their children, including during holidays. While Garner maintains a relationship with her current beau, John Miller, her family believes there's still chemistry between her and Affleck.

Garner and Affleck, who share three children, have been spotted together recently, fueling speculation about a possible reconciliation. The 'Gone Girl' star is currently going through a high-profile divorce from Jennifer Lopez.

  1. Garner's family is hoping for a reunion.The former couple has been spending more time together.Affleck's friends and family are supportive of a reunion.Garner's current partner, John Miller, may feel like a 'third wheel.'
"Ben is laying it on thick, he’s giving Jen so much of himself and his attention and being so charming," a source told In Touch. "It’s very hard not to love him when he’s acting this way, and a lot of people are predicting that they could end up back together."

While there's no confirmation of a reunion, Garner's family and friends are optimistic about the possibility of the former couple getting back together.

item.title: Pushpa 2 box office collection Day 28: Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna starrer shatters records; earns o - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Pushpa 2 box office collection Day 28: Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna starrer shatters records; earns over Rs 10 crore on New Year's day

Publication Date: January 1, 2024

Source: Times of India

The unstoppable 'Pushpa 2: The Rule', starring Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna, continues to break records at the box office, achieving remarkable earnings even in its fourth week.

  • On Day 28, the film earned an estimated Rs 13.15 crore across all languages.
  • The Hindi version contributed approximately Rs 9.5 crore, a rare figure for a film this late in its theatrical run.
  • The Telugu version added Rs 3.15 crore to the day's total.
  • Dubbing versions in Tamil, Kannada, and Malayalam accounted for about Rs 1 crore.
  • The cumulative earnings of Pushpa 2 now stand at approximately Rs 1184.65 crore, cementing its status among the highest-grossing Indian films of all time.
The film's strong New Year’s Day performance saw a staggering 70.78% boost in overall collections.

As Pushpa 2 shows no signs of slowing down, it is anticipated to climb further in box office rankings, astonishing fans and the industry alike.

item.title: PM Modi meets Diljit Dosanjh; calls singer 'multifaceted, blend of talent and tradition' - TOI Etimes
item.description:
PM Modi Meets Diljit Dosanjh

Date: January 2, 2025, Source: Times of India

Prime Minister Narendra Modi met singer-actor Diljit Dosanjh and praised him as 'a combination of talent and tradition'. The two discussed music, culture, and India's vibrancy, including yoga, during their 'memorable' meeting.

  1. Modi lauded Dosanjh's achievements and praised his global success.
  2. Dosanjh admired PM Modi's personal journey and his connection with India.
  3. The meeting concluded with both parties expressing gratitude.
"A fantastic start to 2025. A very memorable meeting with PM @narendramodi Ji." - Diljit Dosanjh

Earlier, Diljit's concert in Ludhiana faced controversy due to songs promoting alcohol, despite previous warnings.

item.title: Angelina Jolie's kids wanted her to defend herself in 8-year divorce battle; Brad Pitt source counters with winery sale - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Brad Pitt, Angelina Jolie's Kids and the Ongoing Divorce Saga

Date & Source: January 1, 2025, Hindustan Times

Introduction: Despite finalizing their divorce, Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt's legal battle continues, with their kids taking sides and a contentious winery sale at the center of their dispute.

  1. Jolie and Pitt's kids have publicly supported their mother during the divorce process.
  2. Three of their six children have dropped 'Pitt' from their names.
  3. Jolie's sons Maddox and Pax worked with her on a movie set, showing their support.
  4. Pitt and Jolie's divorce settlement was finalized on December 30, 2024.
  5. Their fight over the French winery, Chateau Miraval, continues.

A source close to Jolie told PEOPLE that her kids 'wanted her to speak up for herself, to defend herself over these years but she reminds them to focus on changing laws over telling public stories.'

A Brad Pitt source accused Jolie of deliberately disregarding their agreement regarding the winery, stating that she sold her share to 'punish' Pitt.

Conclusion: Despite the finalization of their divorce, Pitt and Jolie's legal battle continues, with their kids taking sides and the future of their co-owned winery at stake.

item.title: 38-Year-Old Man Warns Of World War III In 2025, Past Predictions Proven True - News18
item.description:
38-Year-Old Man Warns Of World War III In 2025, Past Predictions Proven True

Date: January 01, 2025 Source: News18

As the world welcomes a new year, many wonder what the future holds. Nicholas Aujula, a 38-year-old hypnotherapist who predicted the COVID-19 pandemic, forecasts significant global events for 2025.

  • Aujula predicts a Third World War will occur in 2025, characterized by violence and political murders.
  • He foresees excessive rainfall leading to devastating floods, displacing millions.
  • The predictions include rising sea levels that may submerge cities.
  • Aujula indicates a political downfall for British PM Keir Starmer and soaring global inflation.
  • On a personal level, he predicts reconciliation between Prince William and Harry.
“The Third World War is certain to happen in 2025. This will be a year where there will be no compassion.” - Nicholas Aujula

While Aujula's past predictions have proven true, the world waits to see if his latest forecasts will manifest.

item.title: Siddharth corrects Boney Kapoor as he calls Jr NTR a 'new face': 'You are talking about one of the bigges - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Siddharth Corrects Boney Kapoor on Jr NTR's Star Status

Publication Date: Available upon access

Source: Available upon access

In a recent exchange, actor Siddharth responded to Boney Kapoor, who referred to Jr NTR as a 'new face' in the industry, emphasizing Jr NTR's stature as one of the biggest superstars in cinema.

  • Siddharth pointed out the established status of Jr NTR in the film industry.
  • Boney Kapoor's comments seem to downplay Jr NTR's long-standing career.
  • The discussion highlights the recognition and respect given to established actors in the industry.
“You are talking about one of the biggest superstars in the industry,” Siddharth emphasized.

This exchange sheds light on the understanding and acknowledgment of veteran actors in the film sector, showcasing the importance of recognizing their contributions.

item.title: Sridevi was distraught after her break-up with Mithun Chakraborty, says Sujata Mehta: 'They were madly in - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Sridevi was distraught after her break-up with Mithun Chakraborty, says Sujata Mehta: 'They were madly in love'

Publication Date: Not Specified Source: Times of India

In a recent interview, veteran actress Sujata Mehta spoke about her experiences working with Sridevi, shedding light on Sridevi's professional dedication and personal struggles after her break-up with Mithun Chakraborty.

  • Sujata Mehta reflects on Sridevi's humility and professionalism despite her emotional turmoil.
  • The interview highlights rumors of a secret marriage between Sridevi and Mithun Chakraborty.
  • Sujata contrasts Sridevi's personality with the public's perception of her as arrogant.
  • She also discusses Sridevi's relationship dynamics with Madhuri Dixit on set.
“She used to be so distraught, but she was so professional. The moment the camera turned on, she belonged only to the camera.”

The interview provides insights not only into Sridevi's character but also into her relationships with other stars, celebrating their contributions to the industry.

item.title: Anurag Kashyap says he is leaving Mumbai next year: 'I'm so disappointed and disgusted with my own indust - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Anurag Kashyap Leaving Mumbai Next Year

Publication Date & Source: December 21, 2022, Times of India

Anurag Kashyap has announced that he will be leaving Mumbai next year and has expressed his disappointment and disgust with the film industry. The filmmaker, known for his work in both Bollywood and South Indian cinema, has been a prominent figure in the industry for several years. His decision to leave Mumbai has sparked speculation and concern among fans and industry insiders alike.

  • Key Points:
  • Anurag Kashyap announces his decision to leave Mumbai next year.
  • He expresses his disappointment and disgust with the film industry.
  • His decision has sparked speculation and concern among fans and industry insiders.

I'm so disappointed and disgusted with my own industry. I'm leaving Mumbai next year. I can't work in this place anymore. I need to move on.

Anurag Kashyap

This is a developing story. Stay tuned to ETimes for more updates.

item.title: Horoscope Today, January 2, 2025: Check astrological prediction for Capricorn, Aries and other signs - The Indian Express
item.description:
Horoscope Today, January 2, 2025

Publication Date: January 2, 2025 | Source: Indian Express

This article provides astrological predictions for all zodiac signs for January 2, 2025, highlighting personal commitments and opportunities across various areas of life.

  • Aries: Improved prospects in the property market.
  • Taurus: A blinding flash of genius related to overseas connections.
  • Gemini: Pressure at home may require compromise.
  • Cancer: Coming to terms with self-identity amidst struggles.
  • Leo: Career moves in progress, but caution is advised.
  • Virgo: Focus on practical details over imaginative schemes.
  • Libra: Uncertainty in communication, verify facts independently.
  • Scorpio: Clarity about true desires amidst current pressures.
  • Sagittarius: New friends influencing social dynamics.
  • Capricorn: Personal commitments essential for moving forward.
  • Aquarius: Confrontational lessons about change.
  • Pisces: Awareness of impending crises requiring careful navigation.
"The most important lessons in life are often the hardest to learn." - Horoscope for Aquarius

Overall, the horoscopes encourage self-reflection and commitment to personal growth amidst changing circumstances.

item.description:
Inside Alia Bhatt, Ranbir Kapoor, and Raha’s Glamorous New Year Celebration

Date: January 01, 2025

Source: News18

Alia Bhatt, Ranbir Kapoor, and their daughter Raha welcomed 2025 surrounded by family, including Neetu Kapoor and Soni Razdan, creating unforgettable memories filled with love and style.

  • The celebration featured heartfelt moments with family.

item.title: Ileana D'Cruz Expecting 2nd Child With Michael? Actress Showcases Pregnancy Test Kit In New Year Post - News18
item.description:
Ileana D'Cruz Expecting 2nd Child With Michael? Actress Showcases Pregnancy Test Kit In New Year Post

Date: January 01, 2025
Source: News18

Ileana D’Cruz has sparked pregnancy rumours as she shared a New Year post on Instagram, featuring an emotional clip that included a pregnancy test kit.

  • Ileana D’Cruz is married to Michael Dolan.
  • The couple welcomed their first child, Koa, in August 2023.
  • The Instagram post compiled moments from 2024, highlighting a pregnancy test kit in October.
  • Fans are speculating about a second pregnancy based on her New Year post.
  • Ileana recently celebrated Koa’s first birthday with heartwarming family photos.
“Love. Peace. Kindness. Here’s hoping 2025 is all that and so much more ✨,” - Ileana D’Cruz.

This New Year post has excited fans, leading to speculation about a potential sibling for Koa in 2025.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18: Chahat Pandey’s mom claims her daughter never had a boyfriend; Avinash says, “Sabko pata th - The Times of India
item.description:
Bigg Boss 18: Chahat Pandey’s Mom Claims Her Daughter Never Had a Boyfriend; Avinash Says, “Sabko Pata Tha Humare Set Pe Ki Usska BF Hai”

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

The latest episode of Bigg Boss 18 featured a heated exchange between Chahat Pandey's mother and Avinash Mishra regarding allegations about Chahat’s personal life. The confrontation brought joy and tension among the housemates and viewers alike.

  • Chahat Pandey's mother defended her daughter's character vehemently against Avinash's remarks.
  • She claimed that her daughter has never had a boyfriend and expressed her frustration over Avinash's statements.
  • Avinash countered her claims, stating that everyone on set knew about Chahat's supposed boyfriend.
  • The conflict escalated tensions among housemates, splitting opinions on who to believe.
“Aap jiss character ka meri beti ko batate ho, vesi vo hai nahi.” - Chahat Pandey's mother

The ongoing drama continues to evolve in Bigg Boss 18, leaving viewers guessing about the truth behind the claims and how it might affect the contestants' dynamics moving forward.

item.title: Salman Khan Didn't 'Allow' Sangeeta Bijlani To Wear Short Clothes, Actress Says 'I'm Not Afraid Now' - News18
item.description:
Sangeeta Bijlani Opens Up About Salman Khan's Influence on Her Fashion Choices

Published on: January 01, 2025, 16:30 IST

During her appearance on Indian Idol 15, Sangeeta Bijlani revealed that Salman Khan had restrictions on her clothing choices during their relationship. She mentioned that she couldn't wear short or revealing clothes due to his preferences.

  • Sangeeta said, "I was very constricted... I could not wear this kind of dress. Initially, I did but then I was not allowed to."
  • She added that she is now more confident and open about her fashion choices.

Sangeeta and Salman's relationship was one of Bollywood's most talked-about love stories. Despite their breakup, they have maintained a cordial bond over the years.

Published on: Date & Source

An engaging encounter occurred between celebrated singer and actor Diljit Dosanjh and Prime Minister Narendra Modi, highlighting the inspiring story of perseverance and success.

  • Diljit credited his family's support for his achievements.

  • Dosanjh expresses gratitude for his journey from humble beginnings to stardom.
Diljit stated, "Your family named you 'Diljit', so you keep winning."

The meeting marks a significant moment, blending cultural identity with national recognition.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Worldwide Box Office Day 27: Only 100 Crores Away From Baahubali 2, Will Allu Arjun’s Film Rewrite History? - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Worldwide Box Office Day 27: Only 100 Crores Away From Baahubali 2

Publication date: January 1, 2025 | Source: Koimoi

The action thriller Pushpa 2 is experiencing an exceptional run at the box office, nearing the 1700 crore mark after 27 days. The film features Allu Arjun, Rashmika Mandanna, and Fahadh Faasil and is set to potentially rewrite history by competing with Baahubali 2.

Key Points:

  • The film earned 8.55 crores net on day 27, making the domestic total reach 1195.20 crores net.
  • Pushpa 2's global total currently stands at 1699.58 crores.
  • It is just 100 crores away from surpassing Baahubali 2's lifetime earnings of 1800 crores.
  • Pushpa 2 may become the first Indian film to cross the 1200 crore net mark.
“Only time will tell if Pushpa 2 will beat Baahubali 2.”

With an impressive box office performance, it appears that Pushpa 2 may join the ranks of the highest-grossing Indian films, with its final earnings to be influenced by the post-holiday momentum.

item.description:
Diljit Dosanjh Meets PM Narendra Modi After Successful Dil-Luminati Tour In India: Fantastic Start To 2025

Publication Date: January 1, 2025 Source: Times Now

Diljit Dosanjh had a memorable meeting with PM Narendra Modi following his successful Dil-Luminati tour across India. They discussed various topics, including music and culture.

  • Diljit completed his two-month concert tour on New Year’s Eve in Ludhiana.
  • He presented the official poster of Dil-Luminati to PM Modi during their meeting.
  • The Ludhiana concert faced legal issues over the performance of songs promoting alcohol.
  • PM Modi praised Diljit as a blend of talent and tradition.
“A fantastic start to 2025 A very memorable meeting with PM @narendramodi Ji. We talked about a lot of things including music of course!” - Diljit Dosanjh
“A great interaction with Diljit Dosanjh! He’s truly multifaceted, blending talent and tradition.” - PM Narendra Modi

This meeting signifies a blend of culture and politics, marking an exciting beginning to the year.

item.title: Baby John Box Office Day 8 (Early Trends): Shows 27% Growth On New Year But That’s Peanuts Compared To Pushpa 2 - Koimoi
item.description:
Baby John Box Office Day 8: Shows 27% Growth on New Year

Date: January 1, 2025 | Source: Koimoi

Varun Dhawan and Keerthy Suresh's film 'Baby John' is struggling at the box office, showing slight growth during the New Year but still facing significant challenges compared to competitors.

Key Points:

  • Day 8 saw a 27% growth, earning 2.75 crores compared to the previous day.
  • Total first-week earnings are estimated at 36.03 crores.
  • The film is trailing behind other major releases like 'Pushpa 2' and 'Mufasa: The Lion King'.
  • Future projections suggest an eventual box office total of around 60 crores.
“Baby John has badly gotten sandwiched between Pushpa 2 and Mufasa: The Lion King.”

Despite a slight increase in earnings during the holiday season, the overall performance of 'Baby John' has left both audiences and makers disappointed.

item.title: Pushpa 2 box office collection day 28: Allu Arjun film kicks off new year in style, crosses ₹1180 crore - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pushpa 2 The Rule Box Office Collection Day 28: Allu Arjun Film Kicks Off New Year in Style, Crosses ₹1180 Crore

Jan 01, 2025 - Hindustan Times

The Allu Arjun-starrer 'Pushpa 2 The Rule' continues its box office dominance, crossing the ₹1180 crore mark on its 28th day despite being in its fourth week. The film showed growth on New Year's Day, with collections of ₹13.1 crore. Directed by Sukumar, the action drama has had a massive opening weekend and maintained strong collections in its subsequent weeks.

  • The film has collected ₹1184.6 crore in total.
  • It had a massive opening weekend with ₹725.8 crore.
  • The film has a star-studded cast including Allu Arjun, Rashmika Mandanna, and Fahadh Faasil.
  • A sequel, 'Pushpa 2: The Rampage', has been announced.
The incident has brought unwanted attention to the film and its lead actor, Allu Arjun, who was arrested and released on bail following a stampede at the film's premiere that left a woman dead and a child injured.

The film's success has been a major talking point in the Telugu film industry, with its box office collections drawing comparisons to other successful films like 'Dangal'.

item.title: Exclusive| Sajid Khan: I have thought of ending my life many times in the last six years - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Sajid Khan Reflects on Life After #MeToo Allegations: A Journey Through Darkness

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Hindustan Times

Sajid Khan talks about the toll of the #MeToo allegations on his life and career, revealing his struggles and thoughts of suicide over the past six years.

  • Harassment allegations in 2018 disrupted Khan's career and personal life.
  • He reflects on the mental health challenges and financial hardships following the allegations.
  • Khan mentions that he has learned from his past and seeks to return to the film industry.
  • Despite the pain, he professes no animosity towards others involved in the #MeToo movement.
  • Khan expresses a desire to entertain again and acknowledges the struggle of overcoming public scrutiny.
“I thought of ending my life many times in the last 6 years.”

In conclusion, Sajid Khan's experience serves as a reminder of the deep impacts of public allegations and the journey towards healing and renewal in the face of adversity.

item.title: Pride of Tollywood to launch Ram Charan’s Game Changer trailer - 123telugu
item.description:
SS Rajamouli to Launch Ram Charan's 'Game Changer' Trailer

Published on Jan 1, 2025 - 123telugu

Get ready for an exciting movie event! Megapower Star Ram Charan's political action drama, 'Game Changer', is set for a massive release on January 10, 2025. Directed by maverick filmmaker Shankar, making his Telugu debut, the movie is the first Sankranthi film to hit the screens this year. The film's trailer, scheduled to launch tomorrow at 05:04 PM, will now be unveiled by none other than Tollywood's pride, SS Rajamouli.

Rajamouli, who shares a great rapport with Ram Charan, will be the chief guest at the trailer launch event in Hyderabad. The event promises to be a treat for movie buffs, as two of South Indian cinema's most celebrated directors come together on one stage. 'Game Changer', produced by Dil Raju on a massive budget, also stars Kiara Advani, SJ Suryah, Srikanth, Anjali, and Jayaram in key roles.

item.title: Keerthy Suresh reveals why she is still wearing turmeric thread instead of gold mangalsutra after marriage - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Keerthy Suresh Explains Why She's Still Wearing Turmeric Thread Instead of Gold Mangalsutra After Marriage

Date & Source: Jan 01, 2025 - Hindustan Times

Keerthy Suresh, the Tamil film actor, has been spotted wearing a turmeric thread around her neck instead of a gold mangalsutra since her marriage to long-time boyfriend Antony Thattil on December 12, 2024. In several public appearances post-wedding, including promotions for her film 'Baby John', Keerthy has been seen wearing the sacred thread. In a recent interview with Galatta India, Keerthy revealed the reason behind this choice.

  1. Keerthy is wearing the turmeric thread as per tradition, which should not be removed until a certain date after marriage.
  2. She plans to change it to a gold chain on an auspicious date later in January.
  3. Keerthy chose to wear the thread openly as it is considered sacred and powerful, and she liked how it looked with her promotional outfits.
"There's a reason behind why I am wearing it to every promotion... I will be wearing till then. Somebody even told me that if you don't want to wear it with your promotional clothes... the reason why it is tied here is also because it should touch your chest. It is sacred and also supposed to be very powerful. Once you change it to the golden chain, it is going to look normal. Some said that I can even put it inside but I thought it looked hot! I am happy that I am flaunting it."

After her wedding, Keerthy shared pictures from her D-Day on Instagram, captioned '#ForTheLoveOfNyke'.

Baby John, directed by Kalees and presented by Atlee, released in cinemas on Christmas. The film also stars Wamiqa Gabbi, Jackie Shroff, Rajpal Yadav, and Salman Khan in a cameo.

item.title: Sujoy Ghosh to team up with Shahid Kapoor post exit from Shah Rukh Khan starrer King? Here’s what we know! - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Sujoy Ghosh to team up with Shahid Kapoor post exit from Shah Rukh Khan starrer King? Here’s what we know!

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Bollywood Hungama

Bollywood actor Shahid Kapoor and acclaimed director Sujoy Ghosh are reportedly aligning their schedules to collaborate on a new thriller project, although no official confirmation has been made yet.

  • Shahid and Sujoy are prioritizing their schedules to bring the project to fruition.
  • A source indicated that Shahid had previously shown interest in the script, but timing was an issue.
  • The project promises a suspenseful narrative, reflecting Sujoy Ghosh's filmmaking style.
  • Shahid Kapoor's recent works include the digital series Farzi and the film Bloody Daddy.
  • His upcoming film, Deva, is set for release on January 31, 2025.
“Shahid was interested in the script earlier, but the timing wasn’t right. Now, both Sujoy and he are making it a priority to align their schedules and bring it to life.”

The speculation continues as Shahid's team has denied any current negotiations for a new film with Sujoy Ghosh, creating anticipation among fans for what might come next.

item.title: Lord Shiva song from Naga Chaitanya’s Thandel to be out on this date - 123telugu
item.description:
Lord Shiva song from Naga Chaitanya’s Thandel to be out on this date

Published on: Jan 1, 2025 8:01 PM IST

Naga Chaitanya is set to release a new romantic drama titled 'Thandel’, with the second song 'Namo Namah Shivaya' launching on January 4, 2025.

  • The song is a dance number focused on Lord Shiva.
  • The music is composed by Devi Sri Prasad.
  • Filming is scheduled for a February 7 release in multiple Indian languages.
“Happy New Year 2025 ✨ Let’s begin the year with the divine chants of Mahadev 🔱” – GA2 Pictures

This upcoming song is expected to draw significant attention and marks another milestone for the film's promotion.
